amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit any funds from being used for the filing of a complaint or any motion seeking injunctive relief in any legal action brought under the North American Free Trade Agreement Implementation Act or Uruguay Round Agreements Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 1 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit any funds to be used for the filing of a complaint or any motion seeking injunctive relief in any legal action brought under the North American Free Trade Agreement Implementation Act or Uruguay Round Agreements Act.

action.text: On agreeing to the Kucinich amendment (A029) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 226 (Roll No. 385).
